mapper.select: SELECT t.id as id, t.title as title, t.role_code as code, t.expand as expand, t.parent_code as parentCode FROM sys_role t
SELECT t.id as id, t.title as title, t.role_code as code, t.expand as expand, t.parent_code as parentCode FROM sys_role t WHERE t.parent_code = #{roleCode}
SELECT r.id as id, r.title as title, r.role_code as roleCode, r.parent_code as parentCode FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN role_menu rm ON rm.role_code = r.role_code WHERE rm.menu_code = #{menuCode}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role ( id, title, role_code, expand, parent_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{roleCode}, #{expand}, #{parentCode} )
